name: Handwritten digit classifier
tagline: Classifies handwritten digits using Support Vector Machine
body:
# Handwritten-digit-classifier-using-SVM
Classifies handwritten digits using Support Vector Machine

## Implementaion of a mini project descibed in this document I found in the below link
http://www.academia.edu/1161261/Handwritten_Digit_Classification_using_Support_Vector_Machines

## I used the data from the below link 
http://cis.jhu.edu/~sachin/digit/digit.html

### Files
preparedataset.m  - prepares the data for processing.
computefeatures.m - computes various features for each digit image.
trainandclassify.m - trains svm with the features and then use the test data to classify. one-Vs-one svm is used. 

### Confusion Matrix  for 700 training sample and 300 test samples per digit. 
![Confusion Matrix](https://github.com/harshkn/HandwrittenDigitClassifier/raw/master/confusionmatrix.png)
